37 pilz_industrial_motion_planner::LimitsContainer::LimitsContainer()
38  : has_joint_limits_(false), has_cartesian_limits_(false)
39 {
40 }
41 
42 bool pilz_industrial_motion_planner::LimitsContainer::hasJointLimits() const
43 {
44  return has_joint_limits_;
45 }
46 
47 void pilz_industrial_motion_planner::LimitsContainer::setJointLimits(
48  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::JointLimitsContainer& joint_limits)
49 {
50  has_joint_limits_ = true;
51  joint_limits_ = joint_limits;
52 }

54 const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::JointLimitsContainer&

56 {
57  return joint_limits_;
58 }

60 bool pilz_industrial_motion_planner::LimitsContainer::hasFullCartesianLimits() const
61 {
62  return (has_cartesian_limits_ && cartesian_limit_.hasMaxTranslationalVelocity() &&
63  cartesian_limit_.hasMaxTranslationalAcceleration() && cartesian_limit_.hasMaxTranslationalDeceleration() &&
64  cartesian_limit_.hasMaxRotationalVelocity());
65 }
66 
67 void pilz_industrial_motion_planner::LimitsContainer::setCartesianLimits(
68  pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianLimit& cartesian_limit)
69 {
70  has_cartesian_limits_ = true;
71  cartesian_limit_ = cartesian_limit;
72 }
73 
74 const pilz_industrial_motion_planner::CartesianLimit&
75 pilz_industrial_motion_planner::LimitsContainer::getCartesianLimits() const
76 {
77  return cartesian_limit_;
78 }
